extendedInfo.description: Recipes from a beautiful wife!Inside My Cookbook is an app that connects to one of the best cooking blogs on the web, InsideMyCookbook.com! Search and comment on some of the hottest recipes made on a budget from a wonderful wife of a geek! Share recipes with your friends!This is a beta release. There are very likely bugs and will be many updates in the future. Before leaving a poor rating, please contact the developer. Thanks!

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: It load really slow and don\'t get it
reviews.author: Jessica Rohn
